channel.title: Jagex Removing randoms
channel.description:
We had planned some work on the random events of RuneScape quite some time ago. We were looking to see if we could remove most of them, because a decent number were not particularly good at stopping modern-day bots. Since the threat of bots and macros has been largely removed, we feel that this is a perfect opportunity to address the problem again. For the moment, we are concentrating on our PvP minigames to compensate for the Wilderness changes, but the random event proposal has been approved and is in the pipeline.
I'm liking the sound of this... Time to make a new super bot and then use ways of trading to exchange the cash.

item.title: Jagex Removing randoms
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

We had planned some work on the random events of RuneScape quite some time ago. We were looking to see if we could remove most of them, because a decent number were not particularly good at stopping modern-day bots. Since the threat of bots and macros has been largely removed, we feel that this is a perfect opportunity to address the problem again. For the moment, we are concentrating on our PvP minigames to compensate for the Wilderness changes, but the random event proposal has been approved and is in the pipeline.

Read it.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Removing randoms
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

God damn, I can barely do the Molly random without botting, let alone figure out a simple way to handle it with an antirandom and I don’t have the attention span for the mime random. I used to get distracted and no know what he did
Hopefully they’re easy to write for.

Wait, are they removing, or just thinking about removing them? Because sounds like they might update them but then also remove them.

-Holic

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Removing randoms
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:15, topic:193434”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=257466.msg2141373#msg2141373 date=1206737217]

mmm… you had 2 santas on that account, or did you sell them for money, Now i think of it ‘Dave Level 3’ is kind of a sucky name… You need to find out a way of trading money, I had a few but they don’t work now, Unless you employ Mexicans or Chinese people to trade 3k every 15 minutes until it’s done.

Such things are not funny when they are said by the ignorant.

Such things do not have meanining when they are said by the moparscaper.

Again, such things are not funny when they are said by the ignorant.
[/quote]

Taharok just go back to Moparscape, your not funny I’m not funny so just fuck off. This is not funny.

They’re remaking them so there more effective against bots.

No they’re removing them bot numbers have gone down.[/quote]

I, unlike you, don’t have to be funny.

Read full topic
